brand_identity.name: GoldenLane Bowl
brand_identity.archetype: The Caregiver mixed with The Jester
brand_identity.mission: To provide a safe, accessible, and joyful bowling experience for every generation.

rules.accessibility: Minimum font size 16px. Headings must be at least 32px. Use font-medium or font-semibold for body text if contrast is borderline.

usage.primary: Main Call-to-Actions (Book Now), Price Tags, Important Alerts
usage.background: Page Background (Avoid pure white to reduce eye strain)

layout.grid_strategy: Bento Grid for Gallery and Services. Simple 1-col or 2-col for information. Avoid complex masonry.

buttons.style: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-bold shadow-lg hover:shadow-xl transition-all active:scale-95

cards.style: bg-white rounded-2xl border-2 border-secondary/10 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all p-8

inputs.style: h-14 text-lg px-4 rounded-xl border-2 border-secondary/20 focus:border-primary focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 bg-white

navigation.style: Sticky top-0 z-50 bg-background/95 backdrop-blur-md border-b border-secondary/10

hero.description: Main hero background or side image

seniors_family.alt: Happy seniors and family bowling together

kids_party.alt: Group of people having fun bowling

accessibility_rules.contrast: Ensure 4.5:1 contrast ratio for all text. Use dark navy on off-white.
accessibility_rules.focus_states: Visible focus rings (yellow or orange) are mandatory for navigation.
accessibility_rules.touch_targets: All interactive elements must be at least 44x44px.
accessibility_rules.text_sizing: Allow users to zoom without breaking layout. Use relative units (rem) where possible.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Modern Retro' aesthetic: Bold colors, clean lines, nostalgic feel but modern tech.
The Reservation Page must be a simple step-by-step wizard, not a complex dashboard.
Use 'lucide-react' for icons. Pick icons that are thick and easy to read.
Do not use gradients for text. Keep it solid for readability.
Ensure the 'Book Now' button is always visible (sticky) on mobile.
Use the provided image URLs for specific sections. Do not use placeholders.
For the 'Hours' section, use a clear table or list format, not a complex graphic.
Add 'data-testid' to all inputs and buttons.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
